title: James Cleverly – 2022 Comments on Arrest of BBC Journalist in China
author: admin
summary: The comments made by James Cleverly, the Foreign Secretary, on Twitter on 28 November 2022.
content:
Media freedom and freedom to protest must be respected. No country is exempt.
